rooms.primaryDescription: You're in a dark room with one visible door.
rooms.secondaryDescription: After using the torch, you see a sparkle in one of the cracks. After investigating, you see a key

rooms.primaryDescription: This room doesn't look too different than the last
rooms.secondaryDescription: The room is now lit up, and you hear all sorts of bugs and critters scatter into the cracks

rooms.primaryDescription: There's a door at the north end of the room, but it's locked.
rooms.secondaryDescription: The door at the north end opened!

rooms.primaryDescription: There are four different doors, pick your path wisely
Doesn't seem to be anything in here, probably a dead end
There's a locked door with some ancient symbol: 'Requires TI-84'
rooms.secondaryDescription: Wow, that test was hard, but the door opened!

rooms.primaryDescription: Doesn't seem to be too much in this room, except a small computational device
There's sun light coming from the cracks in the room, you're getting close to the exit
It smells of rotten eggs in this room, and there's a big steel door to the south
rooms.secondaryDescription: WOW, the smell of rotten eggs was actually a gas leak and the lighter caused the room to combust. The south door was blown down

rooms.primaryDescription: The exit is right there at the other end...MAKE A RUN FOR IT!!!
You emerge in the dormitory hallway, you look back and see your room number on the wall. Maybe it's time for spring cleaning?
